research_summary: Legal contract review automation through BMAD reduces review time from 45 to 12 days (73% faster) with 80% automated error detection. Thomson Reuters CoCounsel and similar tools demonstrate proven implementation at scale. Key benefits: competitive advantage through speed, massive cost reduction ($6900→26 seconds), attorney resource reallocation to high-value work, 85-92% accuracy for compliance, and elimination of quality variance.
